name: Macanudo Cafe Ascot
notes: A smooth, mild classic with notes of sweet hay, cream, and a hint of vanilla.
description: Macanudo Cafe is one of the world's most popular premium cigars. Wrapped in a silky Connecticut shade leaf, it delivers an incredibly smooth and mellow smoking experience perfect for any time of day.

name: Rocky Patel Vintage 1999
notes: Creamy, nutty, and slightly buttery with a refined finish.
description: Featuring a 7-year-old Connecticut wrapper, this Vintage 1999 blend is elegant and complex without overwhelming the palate. Excellent morning or afternoon smoke.

name: Baccarat Rothschild
notes: Sweetened cap, mild tobacco core with notes of sugar and cedar.
description: Famous for its sweetened cap, Baccarat brings a unique sweetness to a mellow Honduran blend. A very approachable and consistent everyday cigar.

name: Arturo Fuente Hemingway Short Story
notes: Rich cedar, leather, and surprisingly sweet baking spices.
description: A beautifully crafted Perfecto. The Hemingway Short Story is legendary for its flawless construction and rich, medium-bodied Cameroon flavor profile.

name: Romeo y Julieta 1875 Bully
notes: Cedar, toasted nuts, and a delicate floral finish.
description: The 1875 Bully is a staple in humidors worldwide. It offers a classic, balanced, medium-bodied profile that never goes out of style.

name: Acid Blondie
notes: Intensely aromatic, floral, honey, and herbal botanicals.
description: Infused with a secret blend of botanicals and oils, Acid Blondie is a unique, sweet, and highly aromatic smoking experience unlike traditional cigars.

name: Famous Nicaraguan 3000
notes: Earth, dark cocoa, robust pepper, and leather.
description: A house brand favorite offering incredible value. This Nicaraguan puro delivers a rich, bold, and full-bodied experience at an everyday price.

name: Baccarat Churchill
notes: Sweet gum cap, mild tobacco, creamy finish.
description: An extended version of the classic Baccarat blend. Perfect for a long, relaxing, mellow afternoon smoke with a touch of sweetness.

name: Cohiba Behike 52
notes: Rich notes of cedar, leather, and creamy coffee with a floral aroma.
description: The holy grail of Habanos. Behike 52 is made with rare 'medio tiempo' leaves, offering an unmatched depth of flavor and refinement.

name: Padron 1964 Anniversary Natural
notes: Complex cocoa, coffee, and nutty sweetness with a spicy kick.
description: A box-pressed masterpiece. Padron 1964 Anniversary Series is crafted from 4-year-old aged tobaccos for a smooth yet powerful smoke.

name: My Father Le Bijou 1922 Torpedo
notes: Bold notes of black pepper, chocolate, and roasted coffee.
description: Named 'Cigar of the Year' in 2015, this blend is a tribute to Don Pepin's father. It is rich, dark, and wonderfully spicy.

name: Montecristo No. 2
notes: Classic earthy profile with wood, spice, and a creamy finish.
description: Perhaps the most famous torpedo in the world. Montecristo No. 2 defines the classic Cuban flavor profile for many enthusiasts.

name: Oliva Serie V Melanio Figurado
notes: Leather, coffee, and caramel with a smooth pepper finish.
description: Handcrafted using expertly fermented ligero fillers. The Melanio is celebrated for its incredible balance and smooth transitions.

name: Davidoff Grand Cru No. 2
notes: Floral, nutty, and refined with a clean, woodsy finish.
description: The Grand Cru series is inspired by Zino Davidoff's love for fine wines. It is sophisticated, clean, and perfectly constructive.

name: Pardon 1926 Series No. 9 Maduro
notes: Deep dark chocolate, espresso, and spicy black pepper.
description: Released to celebrate Jose Padron's 75th birthday. Each cigar is aged 5 years to ensure a smooth but incredibly rich smoke.
